resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107481</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107481</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085982</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">To know them is to teach them</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie zu kennen ist sie zu unterrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les savoir sont de les enseigner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sabê-los é ensiná-los</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conoscerle sono di insegnarle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ξέρει τους πρόκειται να τους διδάξει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Saberlas son enseñarlas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">We must maintain high standards and expectations, incorporate students' experiences into the curriculum, and use culturally relevant materials.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir müssen hohe Standards und Erwartungen 
beibehalten, Erfahrungen der Kursteilnehmer in den Lehrplan enthalten,
und kulturell relevante Materialien benutzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous devons mettre à jour des niveaux élevés et
des espérances, incorporer les expériences des étudiants au 
programme d'études, et utiliser les matériaux culturelement 
appropriés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós devemos manter padrões elevados e 
expectativas, incorporar experiências dos estudantes no curriculum, e
usar materiais culturally relevantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dobbiamo effettuare gli alti livelli e le 
aspettative, comprendere le esperienze degli allievi nel programma di 
studi ed usare i materiali culturalmente relativi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρέπει να διατηρήσουμε τα υψηλά πρότυπα και τις 
προσδοκίες, να ενσωματώσουν την εμπειρία των σπουδαστών στο 
πρόγραμμα σπουδών, και χρησιμοποιούμε τα πολιτιστικά σχετικά 
υλικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Debemos mantener mayores niveles y expectativas, 
incorporar las experiencias de los estudiantes en el plan de estudios,
y utilizar los materiales cultural relevantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BARBARA RUSH
FN:BARBARA RUSH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085982</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107481</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/to-know-them-is-to-teach-them</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
